document_data.name: Garda Greenleaf
document_data.deathnotes: (Killed by fellow scribe [[Ellison Berenger]] in [[Mantor's Library]])
document_data.mainbody: '''Garda Greenleaf''' was a scribe of [[Mantor's Library]] in [[Phlan]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Description: The librarian was a middle-aged man.
document_data.Personality: The scribe was a senior librarian of Mantor's Library with a flawless record of attendance.
document_data.Possessions: Garda was known to dress in plain grey robes while working in the library.
document_data.History: In 1489 DR, Garda was killed in the Archives room of Mantor's Library by fellow scribe [[Ellison Berenger]], a secret [[Cult of the Dragon]] member, in order of acquire a book about [[Ren o' the Blade]].
